mapper.select: select f.festival_num, f.festival_name, f.festival_content, c.city_address, f.festival_start, f.festival_end, f.festival_count from F_CITY c, F_FESTIVAL f where c.city_num = f.city_num and c.city_name like #{name}|| '%' and f.festival_theme=#{theme} and f.festival_start>=TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYYMMDD') and f.festival_start<TO_DATE(#{start}+1,'YYYYMMDD')

select count(*) from f_festival f, f_city c where f.city_num=c.city_num and c.city_name like #{name}|| '%' and f.festival_theme=#{theme} and f.festival_start>=TO_DATE(#{start},'YYYYMMDD') and f.festival_start<TO_DATE(#{start}+1,'YYYYMMDD')

select f.festival_name, f.festival_start, f.festival_end, c.city_address from F_CITY c, F_FESTIVAL f where c.city_num = f.city_num and festival_start >= TO_DATE(${start},'YYYYMM') AND festival_start< TO_DATE(${end},'YYYYMM') or festival_end >= TO_DATE(${start},'YYYYMM') AND festival_end< TO_DATE(${end},'YYYYMM')
